verses.text: \w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w spake|strong="G3004"\w* a \w parable|strong="G3850"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \add to this end\add*, that men \w ought|strong="G1163"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w* to \w pray|strong="G4336"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* to \w faint|strong="G1573"\w*;

\w Saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \wj  \+w There was|strong="G2258"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w a|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w city|strong="G4172"\+w* \+w a judge|strong="G2923"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G5100"\+w* \+w feared|strong="G5399"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w neither|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w regarded|strong="G1788"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w there was|strong="G2258"\+w* \+w a widow|strong="G5503"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w that|strong="G1565"\+w* \+w city|strong="G4172"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w she came|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w saying|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w Avenge|strong="G1556"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w of|strong="G0575"\+w* \+w mine|strong="G3450"\+w* \+w adversary|strong="G0476"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he would|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w for|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w a while|strong="G5550"\+w*: \+w but|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w afterward|strong="G3326"\+w* \+w he said|strong="G2036"\+w* \+w within|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w himself|strong="G1438"\+w*, \+w Though|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w I fear|strong="G5399"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w nor|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w regard|strong="G1788"\+w* \+w man|strong="G0444"\+w*;\wj*

\wj  \+w Yet|strong="G1065"\+w* \+w because|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w widow|strong="G5503"\+w* \+w troubleth|strong="G3930"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w*, \+w I will avenge|strong="G1556"\+w* \+w her|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w lest|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w her|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w continual|strong="G5056"\+w* \+w coming|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w she weary|strong="G5299"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Hear|strong="G0191"\+w* \+w what|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w the unjust|strong="G0093"\+w* \+w judge|strong="G2923"\+w* \+w saith|strong="G3004"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w avenge|strong="G1557"\+w* \+w his own|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w elect|strong="G1588"\+w*, \+w which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w cry|strong="G0994"\+w* \+w day|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w night|strong="G3571"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w*, \+w though|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w he bear long|strong="G3114"\+w* \+w with|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w*?\wj*

\wj  \+w I tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w he will|strong="G4160"\+w* \+w avenge|strong="G1557"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w speedily|strong="G5034"\+w*. \+w Nevertheless when|strong="G4133"\+w* \+w the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w cometh|strong="G2064"\+w*, \+w shall|strong="G0687"\+w* \+w he find|strong="G2147"\+w* \+w faith|strong="G4102"\+w* \+w on|strong="G1909"\+w* \+w the earth|strong="G1093"\+w*?\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w spake|strong="G2036"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w parable|strong="G3850"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w trusted|strong="G3982"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w themselves|strong="G1438"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* they \w were|strong="G1526"\w* \w righteous|strong="G1342"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w despised|strong="G1848"\w* \w others|strong="G3062"\w*:

\wj  \+w Two|strong="G1417"\+w* \+w men|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w went up|strong="G0305"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the temple|strong="G2411"\+w* \+w to pray|strong="G4336"\+w*; \+w the one|strong="G1520"\+w* \+w a Pharisee|strong="G5330"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the other|strong="G2087"\+w* \+w a publican|strong="G5057"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w The Pharisee|strong="G5330"\+w* \+w stood|strong="G2476"\+w* \+w and prayed|strong="G4336"\+w* \+w thus|strong="G5023"\+w* \+w with|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w himself|strong="G1438"\+w*, \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*, \+w I thank|strong="G2168"\+w* \+w thee|strong="G4671"\+w*, \+w that|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w I am|strong="G1510"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w as|strong="G5618"\+w* \+w other|strong="G3062"\+w* \+w men|strong="G0444"\+w* \+add are\+add*, \+w extortioners|strong="G0727"\+w*, \+w unjust|strong="G0094"\+w*, \+w adulterers|strong="G3432"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w even|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w as|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w this|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w publican|strong="G5057"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w I fast|strong="G3522"\+w* \+w twice|strong="G1364"\+w* \+w in the week|strong="G4521"\+w*, \+w I give tithes|strong="G0586"\+w* \+w of all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3745"\+w* \+w I possess|strong="G2932"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the publican|strong="G5057"\+w*, \+w standing|strong="G2476"\+w* \+w afar off|strong="G3113"\+w*, \+w would|strong="G2309"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w lift up|strong="G1869"\+w* \+w so much as|strong="G3761"\+w* \+add his\+add* \+w eyes|strong="G3788"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w*, \+w but|strong="G0235"\+w* \+w smote|strong="G5180"\+w* \+w upon|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w breast|strong="G4738"\+w*, \+w saying|strong="G3004"\+w*, \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w be merciful|strong="G2433"\+w* \+w to me|strong="G3427"\+w* \+w a sinner|strong="G0268"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w I tell|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w this man|strong="G3778"\+w* \+w went down|strong="G2597"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w his|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w house|strong="G3624"\+w* \+w justified|strong="G1344"\+w* \+add rather\+add* \+w than|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w the other|strong="G1565"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G3754"\+w* \+w every one|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w exalteth|strong="G5312"\+w* \+w himself|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w shall be abased|strong="G5013"\+w*; \+w and|strong="G1161"\+w* \+w he that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w humbleth|strong="G5013"\+w* \+w himself|strong="G1438"\+w* \+w shall be exalted|strong="G5312"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w brought|strong="G4374"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w infants|strong="G1025"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he would \w touch|strong="G0680"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*: but \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \add his\add* \w disciples|strong="G3101"\w* \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \add it\add*, they \w rebuked|strong="G2008"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w called|strong="G4341"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \add unto him\add*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w Suffer|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w little children|strong="G3813"\+w* \+w to come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w unto|strong="G4314"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w forbid|strong="G2967"\+w* \+w them|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w*: \+w for|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w of such|strong="G5108"\+w* \+w is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w Whosoever|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G1209"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w receive|strong="G1209"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w as|strong="G5613"\+w* \+w a little child|strong="G3813"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w in|strong="G3756"\+w* \+w no wise|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w enter|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w therein|strong="G0846"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w ruler|strong="G0758"\w* \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Good|strong="G0018"\w* \w Master|strong="G1320"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* shall I \w do|strong="G4160"\w* to \w inherit|strong="G2816"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Why|strong="G5101"\+w* \+w callest thou|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3165"\+w* \+w good|strong="G0018"\+w*? \+w none|strong="G3762"\+w* \+add is\+add* \+w good|strong="G0018"\+w*, \+w save|strong="G1487"\+w* \+w one|strong="G1520"\+w*, \+add that is\+add*, \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w Thou knowest|strong="G1492"\+w* \+w the commandments|strong="G1785"\+w*, \+w Do|strong="G3431"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w commit adultery|strong="G3431"\+w*, \+w Do|strong="G5407"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w kill|strong="G5407"\+w*, \+w Do|strong="G2813"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w steal|strong="G2813"\+w*, \+w Do|strong="G5576"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w bear false witness|strong="G5576"\+w*, \+w Honour|strong="G5091"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w father|strong="G3962"\+w* \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w thy|strong="G4675"\+w* \+w mother|strong="G3384"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w All|strong="G3956"\w* \w these|strong="G5023"\w* have I \w kept|strong="G5442"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* youth \w up|strong="G3503"\w*.

Now \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* these \w things|strong="G5023"\w*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Yet|strong="G2089"\+w* \+w lackest|strong="G3007"\+w* \+w thou|strong="G4671"\+w* \+w one thing|strong="G1520"\+w*: \+w sell|strong="G4453"\+w* \+w all|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3745"\+w* \+w thou hast|strong="G2192"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w distribute|strong="G1239"\+w* \+w unto the poor|strong="G4434"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w thou shalt have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w treasure|strong="G2344"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w heaven|strong="G3772"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w come|strong="G1204"\+w*, \+w follow|strong="G0190"\+w* \+w me|strong="G3427"\+w*.\wj*

And \w when|strong="G1161"\w* he \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w this|strong="G5023"\w*, he \w was|strong="G1096"\w* very \w sorrowful|strong="G4036"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* he \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w very|strong="G4970"\w* \w rich|strong="G4145"\w*.

And \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* saw \w that|strong="G1492"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* very \w sorrowful|strong="G4036"\w*, he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w How|strong="G4459"\+w* \+w hardly|strong="G1423"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w they that|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w have|strong="G2192"\+w* \+w riches|strong="G5536"\+w* \+w enter|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*!\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w it is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w easier for|strong="G2123"\+w* \+w a camel|strong="G2574"\+w* \+w to go|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w through|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w a needle’s|strong="G4476"\+w* \+w eye|strong="G5168"\+w*, \+w than for|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w a rich man|strong="G4145"\+w* \+w to enter|strong="G1525"\+w* \+w into|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add it\add* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Who|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w can|strong="G1410"\w* be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*?

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \wj  \+w The things which|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w are|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w impossible|strong="G0102"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w men|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w are possible|strong="G1415"\+w* \+w with|strong="G3844"\+w* \+w God|strong="G2316"\+w*.\wj*

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w*, \w Lo|strong="G2400"\w*, \w we|strong="G2249"\w* have \w left|strong="G0863"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w followed|strong="G0190"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* he \w said|strong="G2036"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Verily|strong="G0281"\+w* \+w I say|strong="G3004"\+w* \+w unto you|strong="G5213"\+w*, \+w There is|strong="G2076"\+w* \+w no man|strong="G3762"\+w* \+w that|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w hath left|strong="G0863"\+w* \+w house|strong="G3614"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w parents|strong="G1118"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w brethren|strong="G0080"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w wife|strong="G1135"\+w*, \+w or|strong="G2228"\+w* \+w children|strong="G5043"\+w*, \+w for|strong="G1752"\+w* \+w the kingdom|strong="G0932"\+w* \+w of God’s|strong="G2316"\+w* \+w sake|strong="G1752"\+w*,\wj*

\wj  \+w Who|strong="G3739"\+w* \+w shall|strong="G0618"\+w* \+w not|strong="G3361"\+w* \+w receive|strong="G0618"\+w* \+w manifold more|strong="G4179"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w this|strong="G5129"\+w* \+w present time|strong="G2540"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w in|strong="G1722"\+w* \+w the world|strong="G0165"\+w* \+w to come|strong="G2064"\+w* \+w life|strong="G2222"\+w* \+w everlasting|strong="G0166"\+w*.\wj*

¶ \w Then|strong="G1161"\w* he \w took|strong="G3880"\w* \add unto him\add* the \w twelve|strong="G1427"\w*, and \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \wj  \+w Behold|strong="G2400"\+w*, \+w we go up|strong="G0305"\+w* \+w to|strong="G1519"\+w* \+w Jerusalem|strong="G2414"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w all things|strong="G3956"\+w* \+w that are|strong="G3588"\+w* \+w written|strong="G1125"\+w* \+w by|strong="G1223"\+w* \+w the prophets|strong="G4396"\+w* \+w concerning the Son|strong="G5207"\+w* \+w of man|strong="G0444"\+w* \+w shall be accomplished|strong="G5055"\+w*.\wj*

\wj  \+w For|strong="G1063"\+w* \+w he shall be delivered|strong="G3860"\+w* \+w unto the Gentiles|strong="G1484"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w shall be mocked|strong="G1702"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w spitefully entreated|strong="G5195"\+w*, \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w spitted on|strong="G1716"\+w*:\wj*

\wj  \+w And|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w they shall scourge|strong="G3146"\+w* \+add him\+add*, \+w and put|strong="G0615"\+w* \+w him|strong="G0846"\+w* \+w to death|strong="G0615"\+w*: \+w and|strong="G2532"\+w* \+w the third|strong="G5154"\+w* \+w day|strong="G2250"\+w* \+w he shall rise again|strong="G0450"\+w*.\wj*

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w understood|strong="G4920"\w* \w none|strong="G3762"\w* of these \w things|strong="G5130"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w saying|strong="G4487"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w hid|strong="G2928"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* knew \w they|strong="G1097"\w* the things \w which|strong="G3588"\w* were \w spoken|strong="G3004"\w*.

¶ \w And|strong="G1161"\w* it came to \w pass|strong="G1096"\w*, that \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was come \w nigh|strong="G1448"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w Jericho|strong="G2410"\w*, a \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* blind \w man|strong="G5185"\w* \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w by|strong="G3844"\w* the way \w side|strong="G3598"\w* \w begging|strong="G4319"\w*:

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w hearing|strong="G0191"\w* the \w multitude|strong="G3793"\w* pass \w by|strong="G1279"\w*, he \w asked|strong="G4441"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w it|strong="G5124"\w* \w meant|strong="G1498"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w told|strong="G0518"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* of \w Nazareth|strong="G3480"\w* passeth \w by|strong="G3928"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* he \w cried|strong="G0994"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \add thou\add* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w David|strong="G1138"\w*, have \w mercy|strong="G1653"\w* on \w me|strong="G3165"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w which|strong="G3588"\w* went \w before|strong="G4254"\w* \w rebuked|strong="G2008"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* he should \w hold|strong="G4623"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w peace|strong="G4623"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* he \w cried|strong="G2896"\w* so \w much|strong="G4183"\w* the \w more|strong="G3123"\w*, \add Thou\add* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w* of \w David|strong="G1138"\w*, have \w mercy|strong="G1653"\w* on \w me|strong="G3165"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w*, and \w commanded|strong="G2753"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to be \w brought|strong="G0071"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*: and \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* was come \w near|strong="G1448"\w*, he \w asked|strong="G1905"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*,
